Description.Text: The hotel rooms have excellent lighting, comfort and exclusivity for guests to feel at home. They are equipped with 32-inch LCD TVs with satellite channels, a DVD player and a home theatre for guests to enjoy their favourite film with excellent picture and sound quality. In addition to a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer, further standard features of accommodation units include a direct dial telephone, minibar, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a double bed and a safety deposit box.

At this boutique hotel located in UsaquÃ©n (the restaurant district of Bogota, Colombia), each room like the lobby is decorated by a Colombian artist. It is notable for its personal service and its 9 rooms have excellent lighting, comfort and exclusivity for guests to feel at home. It is a different concept to what is commonly called a hotel, seeking guests who co-habit with art. It has a bar decorated in the style of contemporary art, which offers guests a casual menu. Further facilities available to guests at this establishment include a restaurant, wired and wireless Internet access and room and laundry services. Furthermore, there is a bicycle hire service and a car park.
